channel.title: Massacred source problem - items kept on deatj
channel.description:
hello there, i downloaded the massacred source/client, and its very good, but theres something which i didnt like.
items kept on death, it doenst work! it says 'coming soon!', so, i want to know how to add this interface. the client already have the button, and when we click on this, this messages appears : coming soon!
how do i add items kept on death?
ps. is tried searching at tut board, i didnt find!! thanks
